alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 12:18AM CDT until September 20 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Mobeetie, or 16 miles southeast of Miami, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Briscoe, Wheeler, Allison, New Mobeetie, and Mobeetie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
